text: NGC 170 is a lenticular galaxy located in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered on 3 November 1863 by Albert Marth. == See also == * Lenticular galaxy * List of NGC objects (1–1000) == References == == External links == * * * SEDS Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1863 Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Discoveries by Albert Marth 0170 002195
title: NGC 170
